thread.title: Maria Pelekanou
thread.title_full: Rapid Formations reviewed by Maria Pelekanou

author: Maria Pelekanou
title: Maria Pelekanou
text:
I have never formed a Company online and approached the task with some trepidation.
I need not have worried as the whole process was much easier than I thought and was completed in no time.
The cost to was, in my opinion, extremely reasonable.
All documentation, both online and by post, was received very quickly.
Well done Rapid Formations, I will use you again, if and when necessary
